title: Client won't launch?
body: Is anybody else having trouble actually getting their client to start? When I open the client, I can click "Launch", but then the open screen goes away and nothing happens. If I open Task Manager, nothing is there. Any thoughts about how I can fix this?

replies.body: Are you using the Alpha client or regular client? I'll need a few more details to help. ^.^
I'm having a  similar problem. I have been using alpha client but currently if i try to open it, bug splat just appears. My regular client works fine.

I'm from http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/V0y0UHsP-client-620-621-client-wont-launch-properly
Came here to see if anyone had answers but seems not yet.
Spent 2 hours digging around and I couldn't figure out any fix.

try downloading this and replace your rads/ system folder...make a copy of your rads/systems folder somewhere.. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204894140-Installing-the-PBE-Client and then run C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases/xxxxx\deploy/lolclient.exe...if some error pops up click ok and replace the systems folder with the copy and start launcher

try downloading this and replace your rads/ system folder...make a copy of your rads/systems folder somewhere.. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204894140-Installing-the-PBE-Client and then run C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases/xxxxx\deploy/lolclient.exe...if some error pops up click ok and replace the systems folder with the copy and start launcher

I am having the exact same issue. I have an open ticket with support that's trying to say it's a networking thing when it's definitely client side. There is another post about it here:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/V0y0UHsP-client-620-621-client-wont-launch-properly

I added that link and yours to my support ticket and bookmarked this in case a fix comes via the support ticket. I have jumped through pretty much every hoop they have and it's still broken.
